name: Trieve
headline: All-in-one API for search, RAG, & recommendations
description:
Infrastructure for search teams building retrieval and RAG. Trieve combines search language models with tools for tuning ranking and relevance.

Building excellent search is difficult and can take months to implement then even more time to maintain. Trieve offers production-ready infrastructure that works out of the box to help search teams build adjustable AI search and RAG into their products. With tools for custom models, relevancy weighting, date-recency biasing, semantic full-text hybrid search, recommendations, and more Trieve covers the full spectrum of what a team wants from their discovery infrastructure.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:open-source; industry:api; industry:search; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Nicholas Khami, Founder
founders.description: Find me at https://github.com/skeptrunedev . My primary hobbies are reading progression fantasy, riding motorcycles, and running.

generated_description:
**Trieve: Simplifying AI-Powered Search**

Founded in 2023 and currently part of Y Combinator’s Batch W24, Trieve is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to revolutionize the way search and recommendations are done. With a relatively small team of just 7 employees, Trieve is tackling one of the most complex problems in tech: building an effective search infrastructure.

At its core, Trieve serves as an all-in-one API designed for search, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), and recommendations. Think of it as the ultimate toolkit for developers who want to integrate sophisticated search capabilities into their applications without the usual hassle. Historically, creating a robust search function could take months, but Trieve promises a production-ready solution that works right out of the box.

### What Sets Trieve Apart?

Trieve combines cutting-edge search language models with advanced tools that allow teams to fine-tune their search results. The features include:
- **Semantic Vector and Hybrid Search**: Out-of-the-box support for both semantic and full-text search.
- **Custom Models and Embedding Options**: A flexible infrastructure that allows for stock or custom embedding models.
- **Relevancy Tuning**: Fine-tune search results and boost performance via an API or a no-code dashboard.
- **Comprehensive Coverage**: From chunking data to providing analytics, Trieve covers all bases with its API.

This comprehensive approach lets teams manage everything from ingestion to analytics with ease. For those with stringent data requirements, Trieve even offers self-hosting capabilities.

### Use Cases and Applications

Today, Trieve is already powering over 30,000 discovery experiences across various sectors, including e-commerce and analytics. Companies leveraging Trieve can build a competitive edge by enhancing their search functionality and overall user experience.

### Why Choose Trieve?

If you want to set up industry-leading search capabilities in under 30 minutes, Trieve is your go-to solution. By simply uploading data, integrating the API, and tweaking search parameters, businesses can have a sophisticated search engine up and running without extensive downtime or ongoing maintenance burdens. 

In short, if search is a crucial component of your product, or if you’re committed to building an exceptional discovery experience, Trieve positions itself as a powerful partner. For a closer look at what Trieve can do, visit their website at [trieve.ai](https://trieve.ai) or request a demo to see the magic in action.
